problem_text_cn: 如图,已知△ABC和△DEC的面积相等,点E在BC边上,DE∥AB交AC于点F,AB=6,EF=4,则DF的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the areas of △ABC and △DEC are equal, point E is on the edge of BC, DE ∥ AB intersects AC at point F, AB = N_0, EF = N_1, then the length of DF is ()
raw_answer: 解:作CM⊥AB交EF于N,垂足为M．∵EF∥AB,∴△CEF∽△CBA,∴\frac{EF}{AB}=\frac{CN}{CM}=\frac{4}{6}=\frac{2}{3},设CN=2h,CM=3h,则MN=h,∵S~△ABC~=S~△CED~,∴S~四边形ABEF~=S~△DFC~,∴\frac{1}{2}(AB+EF)•MN=\frac{1}{2}•DF•CN,∴\frac{1}{2}(4+6)•h=\frac{1}{2}•DF•2h,∴DF=5,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查相似三角形的判定和性质、梯形的面积、三角形的面积等知识,解题的关键是学会添加常用辅助线,灵活运用所学知识解决问题,属于中考常考题型．
